changes: Added Escape key event handling in handleKeyDown callback
Updated event listener dependencies to include onClose
Removed previous comments about future Escape key implementation

patterns_discovered: Keyboard event handling within React hooks
Preventing default event behavior for custom key handlers
Modular hook design with configurable close behavior
gotchas_discovered: Need to call event.preventDefault() and event.stopPropagation() for proper event management
Importance of including all dependencies in useCallback to prevent stale closures

approach_outcome.primary_goal: Add keyboard event listener for Escape key to close the dialog

recommendations: Consider extracting keyboard event logic into a separate utility for reusability
Add comprehensive error handling for onClose callback
Consider adding optional configuration for which keys trigger the close event
